extendedInfo.description: If you like jigsaw puzzles, you will love Jigzle. This app includes puzzles suitable for all ages, ranging from 12 to 104 pieces. So, whether you are looking for a small puzzle to share with your 3-year-old child or a more challenging one for your relaxing moments or waiting times, download Jigzle and start playing. In each of the apps in the Jigzle's series you will find 100 preloaded puzzles grouped by theme and, in addition, you will be able to create your own puzzles using your favourite photos.Put the pieces together as you would do in a real puzzle. Sort the pieces on the board and when you find two that seem to match, drag one near the other. If they really match, they will automatically join together. The difficulty of the puzzles can be increased by enabling the rotation of the pieces and largest puzzles can be recomposed organizing pieces in different areas of the board, zooming and scrolling the screen to move from one place to another.Additional features include:Ability to save an incomplete puzzle to resume it later.Puzzle image preview.Option to change the touch area size depending on your finger thickness.

reviews.title: Excellent to get real puzzle pieces
reviews.comment: This is very addictive and runs very well compared to other apps and traditional pieces with the choice of rotation can make some puzzles more challenging. Only minor critiscm from my point of view is I\'d love to know where some of these places are? Any chance that being added? All in all a great app thanks
reviews.author: Mel W

reviews.title: Wish I could give it 5 stars
reviews.comment: I really love this app.  And this latest version is the icing on the cake.  Unfortunately it just doesnt work well on my Samsung Galaxy Note.  Crashes when starting and  doesnt save incomplete puzzles.
reviews.author: Cassandra Loerke

reviews.title: amazing!!!!
reviews.comment: i never rate apps, but this one is truley awesome!! i luv that u can make any gallery pic a puzzle :-) thank u thank u for an amazing puzzle app!! :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use your own pictures
reviews.comment: I love having friends play this without telling them they\'re in the picture
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: One of my favorite puzzle apps. Ability to create your own puzzle, choose difficulty and not be timed make this a relaxing and enjoyable app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really digging this app, feels just like a doing a real jigsaw. Goes above and beyond other \'puzzle\' apps on the market
reviews.author: A Google User
